description.value:
Generations ago, a demon spread its filth into the essence of your bloodline. While it doesn’t manifest in all of your kin, in those moments when you’re bloodraging, you embody its terrifying presence.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{Cleave}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.dn2KgHFQRbuoNRx0]{Improved Bull Rush}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lpXdFoT6OqS5vi2X]{Improved Sunder}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{Intimidating Prowess}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{Ray Of Enfeeblement} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{Bull's Strength} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{Rage} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{Stoneskin} (16th)
